analysis.key_quote: Schedule F is an authoritarian power grab—plain and simple. It’s designed to purge thousands of experienced, nonpartisan public servants and replace them with political loyalists who will do Donald Trump’s bidding, no matter how extreme.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by framing it as an authoritarian move that undermines democracy and the integrity of the civil service. It highlights concerns about politicization and the loss of experienced, nonpartisan public servants.
